title: Scale a Deployment
description: Scale the ||web-deploy|| Deployment to ||5|| replicas in the ||mars|| namespace.

validations.command: kubectl get deployment web-deploy -n mars -o jsonpath='{.spec.replicas}'
validations.description: Deployment should be configured for 5 replicas

validations.command: kubectl get deployment web-deploy -n mars -o jsonpath='{.status.readyReplicas}'
